Articles.Content: I don\'t know how to get it to work at all.
Have you done one manually? It helps if you know how to do one without Mechjeb I found.
I have never done one but I know the basics of one, you got to align the planes, sync the orbits speed, ETC

That module just gives you data on your orbit. The Ascent Autopilot has a function that lets you select another vessel and rendezvous with it. In my experience, it gets you within 20-30km, you have to do the rest.
Do you have Kosmo-not\'s rendezvous table? It is the best way to rendezvous currently.

I don\'t know how to get it to work at all.

Here\'s a post from the SA KSP thread that explains, fairly well, how to use the Sync orbits part of Mechjeb. It was written when that facility was still part of Rincomp, but most of it remains applicable.

http://forums.somethingawful.com/showthread.php?action=showpost&postid=404079876
